title: Having Soraka or Janna as your support is the same as being AFK
body:
They literally do nothing. So it's totally justified if I just AFK out, right? I had some troll pick Soraka today and about two levels into the laning phase I had enough, told him to fuck off, and went for a smoke. I was gonna lose anyway so it's not like it matters, right? As an ADC player, I almost hate Janna as much but not just quite enough since she at least does something.

Why do people pick these shitty passive supports other than to hide their mechanical ineptitude? It pisses me as an ADC player off.

Passive laning phase is a viable strat especially vsing hyper carriers like twitch. I play Lulu support and i am very passive with her. I throw out auto attack pokes when i can but wont ever risk doing that when i am vsing strong lane bullies like {{champion:143}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:22}}  etc etc because all those champs have hard cc enguages that can easily cost us the lane if i get caught poking to much. However Lulu is very good at making a lane safe for farming and also allowing her ADC to win trades.

All supports benefit their ADCs differently,  you just cant understand how to use a passive support like Soraka and Janna because you focus to much on getting early game aggressive kills to keep you ahead rather then farming.
